tagline: A short follow-up from one [RailsGirls PDX](http://railsgirls.com/portland) group's breakout session
body:
## Topics we covered
Even though we only had a day together, we talked about a lot of different things.  Hopefully the stuff found below will be helpful as you continue to learn about Ruby on Rails and developing web applications!

# Tools
* Command Prompt
* Text editor (Komodo)
* Browser

# Concepts
* Ruby
* Gems
* Ruby on Rails
* Models, Views, and Controllers

# Do stuff!
* Creating a new Rails app
* Generating a Scaffold for Blog Entry functionality
* Adding a new Gem (twitter-bootstrap-rails
* Modifying your views

## Topics we mentioned:
* Renaming your app
* JSON and Hashes
